other_tests.findings: No white cells, 24 red cells per cubic millimeter, a protein level of 1.50 g per liter, and a glucose level of 3.1 mmol per liter.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Repeat lumbar puncture revealed 16 white cells per cubic millimeter (100% macrophages) and 270 red cells per cubic millimeter. The protein level was elevated at 1.20 g per liter, and the glucose level was 4.2 mmol per liter.

other_tests.findings: Scant CD4 and CD8 endoneurial lymphocytic infiltrate and severe axonal degeneration with myelin-filled macrophages.
Pathological testing showed a diffuse infiltrate of medium-to-large B cells, diagnostic of diffuse large B-cell lymphoma.
